Issue.creator: sejalpawar
Issue.summary: Access Denied (invalid cryptographic credentials) while issuing transaction proposal through Idemix User
Issue.description: WARN 196 channel mychannel : creator certificate is not valid: Failed verifing with opts &{ {1 111 114 103 49 46 100 101 112 97 114 116 109 101 110 116 49 } {2 1} {0 } {0 } 3 0 0xc00000f6f8 0} : signature invalid: APrime and ABar don't have the expected structure Note: If used Fabric CA instead of idemixgen or Fabric SDK sample certificates from git repo, it goes into transacttion time expired. >
